title: 76/690/EEC: Commission Decision of 30 June 1976 authorizing the United Kingdom to restrict the marketing of seed of certain varieties of agricultural plant species (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 30 June 1976  authorizing the United Kingdom to restrict the marketing of seed of certain varieties of agricultural plant species  (Only the English text is authentic)  (76/690/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The United Kingdom is hereby authorized to prohibit the marketing in its territory of seed of the following varieties listed in the 1976 common catalogue of varieties of agricultural plant species:  (1)OJ No L 225, 12.10.1970, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 356, 27.12.1973, p. 79. (3)OJ No L 46, 21.2.1976, p. 32.   1. FODDER PLANTS
Lolium multiflorum
Broxy
Prego DĂŚhnfeldt
II. CEREALS
Hordeum polytichum
Dura
The authorization under Article 1 shall be withdrawn as soon as it is established that the conditions thereof are no longer satisfied.

The United Kingdom shall notify the Commission of the date from which it makes use of the authorization under Article 1 and the detailed methods to be followed. The Commission shall inform the other Member States thereof.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1976.
For the Commission
P.J. LARDINOIS
Member of the Commission
